attributes.action: Create an imbargo on the importing of Fruit and vegetables that  Israel import into this Country until they stop bombing innocent people living in The Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the importation of all goods fruit and vegetables from Israel until they stop killing innocent people living in The Gaza strip.  The international community have asked them to stop and they still carry on killing children and innocent people living in Gaza.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
